name: @ln-maf/postgresql
description: PostgreSQL support / step definitions for MAF

scripts.test: npm run postgres:start && npm run test:run && npm run postgres:stop
scripts.test:coverage: npm run postgres:start && npm run test:run:coverage && npm run postgres:stop
scripts.test:run: wait-on tcp:localhost:5433 && sleep 5 && mkdir -p test/report && npm run cucumber:exec && npm run test:finalize
scripts.test:run:coverage: wait-on tcp:localhost:5433 && sleep 5 && mkdir -p test/report && npm run cucumber:exec:coverage && npm run test:finalize
scripts.cucumber:exec: USE_ENV_VARIABLES=TRUE POSTGRESQL_SQL_USERNAME=postgres POSTGRESQL_SQL_PASSWORD=testpassword npx cucumber-js -f json:test/report/postgresql.json --require "stepDefinitions/*.js" features/$FEATURE_FILE
scripts.cucumber:exec:coverage: USE_ENV_VARIABLES=TRUE POSTGRESQL_SQL_USERNAME=postgres POSTGRESQL_SQL_PASSWORD=testpassword npx nyc --reporter=lcov --reporter=text --report-dir=../../coverage npx cucumber-js -f json:test/report/postgresql.json --require "stepDefinitions/*.js" features/$FEATURE_FILE
scripts.postgres:start: docker-compose up -d && echo 'Waiting for PostgreSQL to be ready...' && sleep 10
scripts.postgres:shell: docker exec -it postgres-test psql -U postgres -d testdb
